Reviews.Title: 5 STAR CAMERA.
Reviews.Author: CHUPAKABRAS "JC"
Reviews.Content: LAST WEEK I WAS READING OTHERS REVIEW OF THIS CAMERA,.I HAVE A NIKON D40, THAT'S TOO MUCH FOR MY WIFE,. SO I WAS LOOKING FOR A SMALLER NICER PRETTY AND WITH A TOUCH SCREEN CAMERA FOR MY WIFE,. AND EASY TO USE,. THE REVIEWS WERE NOT THAT GOOD, ALTOUGHT THAT, I DARE TO BUY IT,. SO I WAS EXPECTING THE WORST, BUT FOR SORPRISE OF ME,. I LOVE THIS CAMERA,. IT'S EVERYTHING YOU EXPECT FROM A NIKON CAMERA,. MY WIFE FIND IT EASY TO USE,. SHE'S IN LOVE WITH THIS CAMERA, THE QUALITY OF THE PICS ARE AWSOME,. THE TOUCH SCREEN WORKS GREAT, I REALLY DON'T KNOW WHY OTHER PEOPLE GAVE IT JUST 1 STAR OUT OF 5, AS I SAID BEFORE I'M USED TO THE QUALITY OF A SLR D40, THE S60 REALLY IMPRESED ME. FULLY RECOMMENDED.

Reviews.Title: Poor photo quality
Reviews.Author: L. B. Snell
Reviews.Content: I recently received this camera and I am very disappointed with the quality of photos that is coming out of a 10mp camera. I had an 8mp sony previously and the photo quality was much better. The camera often takes fuzzy pictures and for the price and the features that it boasts this should not be happening. I take a lot of photos and have used many brands of cameras, this is my first experience with Nikon and I will not be purchasing a Nikon again. By far my favorite cameras have been Sony's and that is what I will be going back to after this huge disappointment. The touchscreen is ok but many other camera brands have those. When you take the battery out to charge this camera you have to reset the date/time and all of your settings (ie if you turned the sound off, photo quality, etc) EVERY TIME YOU TAKE THE BATTERY OUT TO CHARGE IT! This to me is ridiculous for the money and definitely not something I am satisfied with.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S60
Reviews.Author: Deana Johnson
Reviews.Content: Excellent product! It was purchased as a gift for someone and she loves it! It was so difficult to find a white one so I was thrilled when I was able to find one no problem and get it shipped so quickly!

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: Dhighsocr6 "Dhigh"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!  It got here fast and I was so excited.  it takes great pics and you can do so much more with them! I love how big the screen is too!

Reviews.Title: Lots of features
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Downs
Reviews.Content: Tons of features, takes great pictures, couldn't ask for more out of a camera. I'm not fond of the look or feel of it physically, but that's just my tastes. Also, considering the quality of the camera and that it's a touchscreen, it's not the worse price for a camera, but not the best either.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S60 is just what the name says Cool.
Reviews.Author: Arthur J. Urbanc
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my daughters chritmas present. She loves it! After seeing how it works, the touch screen, the scroll from picture to picture, etc... I want one myself.

Reviews.Title: I love it, but poor luminance
Reviews.Author: Minor Jimenez Guevara
Reviews.Content: Almost all are excellent, but the Nikkor lens is too little, it need a lot of light to work, flash light need to be very near.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Wakefield
Reviews.Content: This camera is a+ in features. It takes great photos and has very effective facial tracking software. The touch screen makes using this camera easy. Just make sure that the memory card you purchase is a SDHC class 6. This drastically improves this cameras performance.

Reviews.Title: amazon is terrible
Reviews.Author: Cam Thai-nguyen "disappointed consumer"
Reviews.Content: i'm sure i would love the camera if amazon would ever send my purchase. amazon took my money but the camera is not yet delivered since before christmas.

ProductInfo.Features:
10.0-megapixel resolution for stunning prints as large as 16 x 20 inches
5x optical Zoom-Nikkor glass lens; Optical VR Image Stabilization
3.5-inch high-resolution touch-panel LCD; customizable touch-panel display
Auto adjusts up to ISO 3200; Shutter and Blink Warning
Captures images to SD/SDHC cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon Coolpix S60 10MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Vibration Reduction (VR) Zoom (Arctic White)
